EmailTemplate.name: USAID Grants June2015
EmailTemplate.subject: USAID funding opportunity, any interest?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you're well. Is your team applying for this opportunity? Human Resources for Health Program: http://www.grants.gov/view-opportunity.html?oppId=276732 If so, we would be interested in joining the submission team on the ICT/M&E sides. I realize the deadline is tight (June 22) - but is a great opportunity for you or your partners.
Please let me know if you'd like to jump on a call to discuss this week.
Christina Jeffrey
Christina Jeffrey Partnerships Director, The Americas Dimagi, Inc. www.dimagi.com | www.commcarehq.org
